title: Ignota's DEPARTMENT-CON 2022 Team Icons!
content:
[[module CSS]]

.pictureBox{
width: 95%;
padding: 10px;
border: solid 2px var(--accentColor);
border-radius: 15px;
background-color: #6B537380;
}

.grid-container {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    grid-gap: 20px;
}

image{
width:90%;
}
[[/module]]

[[include component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]]
[[>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Art Mycotherapy**
[[include component:ratio-bar pie=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/>]]
[[module ListPages created_by="IronShears" category="fragment" name="fragment:art-mycotherapy%" order="created_at" limit="1" offset="@URL|0"]]
%%content%%
[[/module]]
[[=]]
+ [[span class="linkTwo"]][http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy-deptcon-icons Original Theme][[/span]]
+ [[span class="linkOne"]][http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy-deptcon-icons/offset/1 Click here if the theme hurts your eyes][[/span]]

[[div style="border-radius: 10px;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: center;
border:solid 2px var(--accentColor);
padding:15px;
margin-bottom: 15px;"]]
+ Remember to have fun!
[[image https://i.imgur.com/Z2NFRly.png]]

Ah yes! Time for a contest that I'm going to force myself into despite the fact that I will not be entering!

I've made some lovely icons for all of the teams! Yes even yours(unless it's not here in which case leave a comment I'll make one for you). All were created by me and have been released under CC-BY-SA 3.0.

Some of them were kind of sort of difficult to find symbols for so if you'd rather I change anything... just let me know.

I'm going to be updating this with any new teams added anyways. **If you notice something wrong with the text portions(Team name, members, etc) you are 100% welcome to fix it without asking.** If you want me to alter one of the icons, just let me know! I'll be happy to fix it.

(All logos are derived from the Sigma-9 logo by Far2)

++ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/div]]
